item.title: About
item.content:encoded:
My mission in life is to not let it be boring. Making the most of every moment is what I strive for, whether that’s studying a hundred disciplines, traveling the world, or helping others. I am now studying Marketing and Global Analysis at the Wharton School of Business (UPenn) with a side pursuit in Fine Arts.

I combined my fascination for art with a will to help others by creating Allo, a social enterprise dedicated to feeding poverty-ridden children. Through Allo, I’ve sold over 1000 stickers online, in galleries, and at events. Over the years I’ve also exhibited regionally and nationally, been awarded several National Scholastic Gold and Silver Keys, and had my work displayed in the state legislature’s permanent collection.

But outside of all that, I’m simply a woman with a passion for art, fashion, and travel. A girl in a world made up of billions that’s happy to share her journey with you. Thank you for taking a moment to hear my random thoughts and see how I exist.

Rithu Rajagopala

Chat with Me!
Name *

Thank you for reaching out! I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

item.title: Shop
item.content:encoded:
Bringing the color to you.

Not many can say they can bring beauty and joy anywhere any day, but here I am offering just that. Celebrate today with any piece that spoke to you. Just click the button below!

Payment methods: Venmo, PayPal, Cash

You’ve successfully bought your piece of art! I’ll reach out to you with the next 24 hours that I’ve received your order and let you know if there any problems. I’m so excited to share this piece of myself with you, and I can’t thank you enough for taking a moment and appreciating art with me.

Make it shine.

Make it yours.

item.title: Home
Women Around the World
item.content:encoded:
We are all Beautiful.

Highlighting the tenacity in all women, this series aims to eliminate the superficial differences we emphasize amongst ourselves and display the true beauty that lies with all.

item.title: Human Vices
item.content:encoded: Inspired by the concept of the Seven Deadly Sins, this series explores the modern day human vices and problems, and the damages they can cause to our world. The vices include poverty, objectification, domestic abuse, human trafficking, smoking, false sense of nationalism, religious stereotypes, gun violence, and loss of identity. These are not the only issues that plague today’s society but ones that I hope are one day addressed regardless.

item.title: Walks of Life
item.content:encoded:
“There’s an awful lot you can tell about a person by their shoes.”

— Forest Gump

There’s an American proverb that tells one not to judge a man (or woman) until you’ve walked a mile in their shoes. This series is meant to tell a story with each piece of a different life, a different person, and a different adventure.

item.title: Breadth
item.content:encoded:
Random thoughts.

It all begins with a catalyst. Maybe there’s something that happens in your life. Maybe there’s something you’ve been trying to find a way to say. Either way, art is a form of expression and sometimes it’s just a miscellaneous group of thoughts that simply need to be expressed.

Everything.

It starts with a sketch.

item.title: Allo: COVID-19 relief
item.content:encoded:
Allo

Art can have a global impact. A fellow artist and I started Allo by selling high-quality phone-sized vinyl stickers featuring our art to raise money for No Kid Hungry, a global charity. Allo comes from the Latin word Alo, meaning to feed. While our small business no longer exists due to us both going to college, it became a huge part of me and a reason for why I’m studying business and sticking with art.
With stickers left to give, I’ve decided to keep Allo's purpose for helping others. All proceeds from purchases made in 2020 will go to COVID-19 relief efforts. I hope you can join me and the rest of the world in a fight against this pandemic. Stay Safe.

$3 per sticker, or commission (prices may vary)

Take your art on the go.
Name *
Phone
Once I see the payment I'll ship the stickers to you.
Shipping Address *

Thank you so much for your support. I know things are a little interesting right now, but there is so much we can do to help and this is just the start. All proceeds from this sticker purchase and the rest will go to COVID-19 relief. Every bit and every smile matters, so stay safe and stay positive!
